    }

            }
         } @media (min-width: 85.625em) and (max-width: 99.3125em) {

            }

<style>.classificacao-Piauiense-2017{background:url(data:image/png;base64,) 0 0 no-repeat}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.s4dejulho_30_1{background-position: 0px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.sriver-escudo-cmyk-sem-estrelas-01-30{background-position: -30px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.sflampi30{background-position: -60px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.saltos-pi30{background-position: -90px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.spicos30{background-position: -120px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.spiuaiec_30{background-position: -150px 0px}.classificacao-Piauiense-2017.sparnahyba30{background-position: -180px 0px}</style>

<section class="gui-card-subtitle gui-color-primary-bg">
    <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/pi/futebol/campeonato-piauiense/index.html#/classificacao-e-jogos" title="Campeonato Piauiense 2017">
        <h2 class="gui-text-subtitle">Campeonato Piauiense 2017</h2>
    </a>

                <li class="gui-card-submenu-item gui-card-select-list-item">
                    <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/basquete/nbb/classificacao.html" class="gui-card-select-list-link"
                       title="NBB"
                         data-slug-edicao="nbb-2016-2017" data-slug-campeonato="nbb">
                        NBB
                    </a>
                </li>
            
                <li class="gui-card-submenu-item gui-card-select-list-item">
                    <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/primeira-liga/" class="gui-card-select-list-link"
                       title="Primeira Liga"
                         data-slug-edicao="copa-sul-minas-rio-2017" data-slug-campeonato="copa-sul-minas-rio">
                        Primeira Liga
                    </a>
                </li>
            
                <li class="gui-card-submenu-item gui-card-select-list-item">
                    <a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/futebol/libertadores/index.html#/classificacao-e-jogos" class="gui-card-select-list-link"
                       title="Taça Libertadores"
                         data-slug-edicao="libertadores-2017" data-slug-campeonato="taca-libertadores">
                        Taça Libertadores
                    </a>
                </li>
            
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

    
</section>

            {{if jogo.url_confronto != null}}
                <a class="gui-color-primary-link" href="${jogo.url_confronto}">

                <a class="gui-color-primary-link" href="${jogo.url_transmissao}">

        {{if jogo.url_transmissao != null || jogo.url_confronto != null}}
            <div class="info-partida confronto">

necessario o segundo jogo</span></div></li></script><script id="template_classificacao_mata_mata_chave_a_definir" type="text/x-jQuery-tmpl"><li class="jogo a-definir"><div class="placar                 <a href="${link}" title="${equipe.nome_popular}" class="escudos">
            {{else}}
                <span title="${equipe.nome_popular}" class="escudos">
            {{/if}}
                <img width="30" height="30" alt="${equipe.nome_popular}" src="${equipe.escudos['30x30']}">
            {{if link}}
                </a>
            {{else}}
                </span>
            {{/if}}
        </td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-sigla">

                <a href="${link}" alt="${equipe.nome_popular}" title="${equipe.nome_popular}" >
            {{/if}}
                ${equipe.sigla}
            {{if link}}
                </a>
            {{/if}}
        </td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-variacao"><div class="ge-card-classificacao-variacao"><span>${variacao}</span><span class="sprite-variacao sprite-${variacao_label}"></span></div></td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-pontos">${ pontos }</td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-vitorias">${ vitorias }</td><td class="ge-card-classificacao-col ge-card-classificacao-saldo">${ saldo_gols }</td></tr></script><script>
$(document).ready(function() {
    "use strict";

    if($('.glb-grid-24')){

        var cardId = '#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915',
                classificacaoFeedReady = false,
                classificacaoCardReady = false;

            $(document).on('bastian-feed-card_rendered', cardId, function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Feed Ready');
                classificacaoFeedReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

            $(document).on('card-classificacao-ready', function() {
                console.debug('Classificacao: Card Ready');
                classificacaoCardReady = true;
                initCardClassificacao();
            });

        var initCardClassificacao = function(){
            if(classificacaoCardReady && classificacaoFeedReady){
                $('#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915').show();
            }
        }
    }

    try {

      var classificacao = new CardClassificacao({
        context: '#ge-card-classificacao-daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915'
      });

      var classificacaoTracking = new CardClassificacaoTracking("daeed1db-21cb-486b-8c9b-56ca1091f915");

    } catch (err) {}

});
</script></div><div class="areatemplate-esquerda
            column
            medium-20 medium-offset-2
            large-15 large-offset-0
            xlarge-14 xlarge-offset-1
            bastian__noshift"><script type="text/javascript">SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN={PORTAL:'ge',FEED_TYPE:'SEMANTICO',DEVICE_GROUP:'desktop',IS_PHOTO_PRIORIZED:false,IS_RECOMMENDED:false,FALKOR_URL:'http://falkor-cda.bastian.globo.com',RECOMMENDATION_URL:'http://recomendacao.globo.com/rec/v2/user?client_id=ge',HORIZON_HOST:'http://horizon.globo.com',PUSHSTREAM_HOST:'stream.push.globo.com',};BastianVersion='1.10.0-rc10';</script><script>SETTINGS=window.SETTINGS||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN=SETTINGS.BASTIAN||{};SETTINGS.BASTIAN["AB_HOST"]="globo-ab.globo.com"</script>
<div id="bstn-launcher"><!--!--><div id="bstn-feed-launcher"><style type="text/css">@media (max-width:539px){body{background-color:#e6e6e6}}.areatemplate-esquerda{margin-top:7px!important}#feed-placeholder,.bstn-feed,.feed-root{contain:layout style}.bastian-page{contain:layout paint style}.bstn-feed{font-size:16px;margin-bottom:32px;overflow:hidden}.bastian-page[data-index="1"] .bastian-feed-item[data-index="1"]>:first-child{margin-top:0}.feed-post{background-color:#fff;contain:layout paint style;margin:16px 0 class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Scarpino aguarda diretoria sobre sua permanência: &quot;Esperar as decisões&quot;</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Técnico do Altos diz que time &quot;deu&quot; dois gols para o Parnahyba, o que tirou o título
do Jacaré; treinador espera reunião na segunda-feira para decidir futuro no cargo</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="8"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a href="http://globoesporte.globo.com/pi/futebol/campeonato-piauiense/noticia/2017/03/bandeirinha-se-engana-e-anula-gol-legal-do-altos-na-final-do-1-turno.html" class="feed-post-figure-link gui-image-hover"><div class="bstn-fd-item-cover bstn-fd-video-cover" style=""><picture class="bstn-fd-cover-picture"><img class="bstn-fd-picture-image" alt="Polêmica à vista: Bandeirinha anula gol legal do Altos na final do 1º turno. Porém, vídeo mostra que lateral do Parnahyba dá condições</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="9"><div><div time: &quot;Acreditaram&quot;</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post     </div>
</section>
